mapper.update: update tb_moneypool set money = money - #{repayMoney} where id=1
mapper.select: select realid,round(sum(money)/(select sum(money) from tb_investmentlist )*100,6) proportion from tb_investmentlist where tendid=#{tendId} group by realid
mapper.update: update tb_realname set balance = balance + #{toPersonMoney} where id=#{realId}
mapper.select: select a.tendid from tb_loanrecord a join tb_systemcategoryitem b on a.longtime=b.id where add_months(trunc(a.begintime),b.item)= trunc(sysdate) and a.STATE=1
mapper.update: update tb_loanrecord set state=2 where tendid =#{tendId}
mapper.select: select a.tendid from tb_loanrecord a join tb_systemcategoryitem b on a.longtime=b.id where add_months(trunc(a.begintime),b.item) <= trunc(sysdate-1) and a.stuts=1
mapper.update: update tb_loanrecord set stuts = 2 where tendid=#{TENDID}
